name: Neck Half Circles
how_to_perform:
1. Slowly tuck your chin towards the right shoulder, bringing your ear towards the top of your spine.

2. Keep your head level and your shoulders relaxed, avoid lifting them up towards your ears.

3. Hold for a brief moment (about 5-10 seconds).

4. Return to the starting position, with your head in line with your spine.

5. Repeat on the other side by leaning your chin towards the left shoulder.
short_summary: Neck half circles is an exercise that targets the neck muscles, stretching and relaxing them.
